name: pminimal
title: Pminimal
desc: Pminimal is a web project built with Astro, designed as a personal portfolio. It leverages Tailwind CSS for styling, providing a sleek and modern user experience.
article: pminimal is a web application built with Astro, designed as a minimalist and smooth personal portfolio. It utilizes Tailwind CSS for styling, ensuring a modern and responsive interface.
